statements: SELECT guest_id, guest_name, room_number FROM guest_check_in_out WHERE booking_status = TRUE;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM guest_check_in_out WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT * FROM guest_check_in_out WHERE guest_id = 1001;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM guest_check_in_out WHERE booking_status = FALSE;
SELECT room_number, guest_name FROM guest_check_in_out ORDER BY room_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM guest_check_in_out WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT guest_name, room_number FROM guest_check_in_out WHERE booking_status = true ORDER BY room_number DESC;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_time FROM guest_check_in_out WHERE room_number IN (101, 102, 103) AND booking_status = true;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM guest_check_in_out WHERE check_out_time > check_in_time AND booking_status = true ORDER BY check_out_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT room_number) AS num_rooms_occupied FROM guest_check_in_out WHERE booking_status = true;
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT full_name, check_in_time FROM guests ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT guest_id, full_name FROM guests WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%';

SELECT guest_id, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT full_name, check_in_time FROM guests ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reservation_date ASC;
SELECT guests.full_name, reservations.reservation_date FROM guests INNER JOIN reservations ON guests.guest_id = reservations.guest_id;
SELECT guest_id, full_name FROM guests WHERE guest_id IN (SELECT guest_id FROM reservations);

SELECT guest_name, check_in_time FROM guests ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT room_number, room_type, occupancy_limit FROM rooms WHERE availability = true;
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date, room_number FROM guests JOIN reservations ON guests.guest_id = reservations.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, status FROM guests JOIN reservations ON guests.guest_id = reservations.guest_id JOIN rooms ON reservations.room_number = rooms.room_number WHERE status = 'confirmed';
SELECT guest_name, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM guests;
SELECT reservation_date, room_number, status FROM reservations WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT room_type, occupancy_limit, availability FROM rooms WHERE room_type = 'Suite';

SELECT reservation_date, room_number, status FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;

SELECT guest_name, check_in_time FROM guests ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;

SELECT guest_name, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM guests ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date FROM guests JOIN reservations ON guests.guest_id = reservations.guest_id WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_timestamp, check_out_timestamp FROM guests INNER JOIN check_ins ON guests.guest_id = check_ins.guest_id INNER JOIN check_outs ON guests.guest_id = check_outs.guest_id
